name: SlokaTime
0:
”Alexa, ask Sloka Time to play music”
”Alexa, open Sloka Time”
”Alexa, ask Sloka Time to play the music”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sloka time
des: This skill plays tens of slokas for kids and everyone to listen to. Kids can sing along to memorize and practice slokas.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
